name: AVDisplayManager
desc: A tvOS management object that controls whether a TV switches modes to match the video’s native mode.

items.name: var preferredDisplayCriteria: AVDisplayCriteria?
items.desc: A hint for the TV to set the display mode to best match the currently playing content’s display criteria.

items.name: var isDisplayCriteriaMatchingEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user has enabled display critera matching.

items.name: var isDisplayModeSwitchInProgress: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a display mode switch is in progress.
